::Hot Rod::

When he tackled Dragonfly he pressed right against him, and grabbed. He
was now to close for the punches. They would only be able to punch his
back and maybe arm. Hot Rod stuck his saw blade right into where
Dragonfly's Spark would be.

OOC: Since Hot Rod was pressed right up against Dragonfly, it is legal
for me to post for Hot Rod actually doing that damage.
